regen.absent_element: situation of displaying a message when no results are found
regen.new_specification: If no results are found, a message will be displayed to inform the user that no results have been found.
If no results are found from the search, a message indicating 'No results found' will be displayed to the user.

regen.absent_element: situation when no results are found
regen.new_specification: The system shall display a message stating no results were found if the search yields no results.

label: If no results are found on a search it will display a message that No results were found for this search.
absence: situation of no results were found
